overview_of_class: Theatre in the context of what? Of what you know about it now? Of what you want to discover? Of how we define it? Of the artists who make it? Of its history? Of our department? Of Chicago? Of how it is practiced internationally? Of who gets to make it? Of how it can change the world? This course will ask (rather than answer) these questions in order 1) to provide a common starting point for you, the incoming class-theatremakers of the present and future, and 2) to ignite an awareness of what you want to find out next, what kind of artists you want to be, what it means to have a rigorous artistic practice, and what the theatrical world around you looks like now-and could look like tomorrow.
